metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31799 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Bottle before 0.12.20 mishandles errors during early request binding.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-bottle - 0.12.7-1+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm1
python3-bottle - 0.12.7-1+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: python-bottle package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.7-1+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
